about_the_game:
TrainingTiles consists of 5 rhythmic mini games, each with its own theme and difficulty level. All the games aim to keep the player moving and having fun with the goal of burning calories. At the end of the game, it will show you the calorie count burned by the player and the player's score compared to their previous records and the records of other players.

MoveBeats

You will have to crouch and move to dodge the obstacles and get the stars that will come at different heights and speeds to achieve the best possible score.

NinjaMusic

Dodge the mines and hit the targets that come in rhythm with the music. You will get double points if you hit the center of the target, thus getting a much higher score.

GravityBubbles

The objective will be bubbles that come from different directions, sizes and colors. Push them with your hands and make them collide with each other. If you pop smaller bubbles you will get more points. But be careful, if a bubble manages to pass you by without you hitting it then you will lose a certain amount of points.

MathBlocks

You will have to solve 20 math problems in the shortest time possible. The shorter the time, the more points you will get. Test yourself, you choose the difficulty.

PushBlocks

Hit the targets that come to the beat of the music, you can choose to play it with your hands or controllers. You will have to move around the game area to get the targets that come on the floor and the floating targets will be faster and faster with unpredictable behavior. Get the highest score and try to keep your streak going.

TrainingTiles consists of 5 rhythmic mini games, each with its own theme and difficulty level. All the games aim to keep the player moving and having fun with the goal of burning calories. At the end of the game, it will show you the calorie count burned by the player and the player's score compared to their previous records and the records of other players.

If you pop smaller bubbles you will get more points. But be careful, if a bubble manages to pass you by without you hitting it then you will lose a certain amount of points.

You will have to move around the game area to get the targets that come on the floor and the floating targets will be faster and faster with unpredictable behavior. Get the highest score and try to keep your streak going.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.15
  • Processor: Procesadores Intel Core i5 o Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Cualquier tarjeta de sonido compatible con el sistema operativo

name: TrainingTiles

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Cualquier tarjeta de sonido compatible con el sistema operativo
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Meta quest2, Es necesario el uso de controles. El espacio de juego es de 1m de alto por 2m de ancho
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • VR Support: OpenXR, Meta quest2, Es necesario el uso de controles. El espacio de juego es de 1m de alto por 2m de ancho

short_description: TrainingTiles is an VR game with 5 rhythmic mini-games that aim to make the player have fun while exercising. Check the calories burned and compete to get the best scores.
